0001.title: Missing Index Key
0001.details: '${field}' is specified as the primary sort field, but is missing from the index key collection.

0003.title: Cache Path Missing
0003.details: `path` must be specified in the request body.

0004.title: Database unavailable
0004.details: The database is currently unavailable. Please retry the request.

0005.title: Unauthorised
0005.details: The request could not be fulfilled because it did not contain a valid bearer token.

0006.title: Access denied
0006.details: The bearer token supplied in the request does not have sufficient permissions to perform the operation.

0007.title: Current secret missing
0007.details: To update the client secret, the current secret must be supplied via the `currentSecret` property.

0008.title: Current secret not valid
0008.details: The supplied current secret is not valid.

0009.title: Partial access
0009.details: The bearer token supplied in the request only has partial access to the resource.
